column1: Proportion of schools with access to the Internet (%)

a: Data refer to the most recent year available during the period specified.
b: Public institutions only.
c: Refers only to ISCED levels 1 and 2.
d: Refers only to ISCED level 3.
e: Refers only to International Standard Classification of Education (ISCED) level 2.
f: Refers to West Bank schools only.
g: There are no private institutions at ISCED level 3.
